pageProduct.name: Antipodes Healthier Skin Heroes Culture Gift Set
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Brighten, soothe, and nourish your skin with three 100% natural origin, certified vegan products made with pure New Zealand ingredients. A skincare set that makes the ideal gift! 
 
Mini Divine Face Oil Rosehip & Avocado Oil (10ml) 
Smooth the appearance of fine lines and soothe stressed skin with this facial oil containing rosehip oil and avocado oil for skin 
 
Culture Probiotic Night Recovery Water Cream (60ml) 
Calm, clear and hydrate your visage with a night moisturiser featuring good bacteria for healthy skin 
 
Mini Halo Skin-Brightening Facial Mud Mask (15ml) 
Detoxify and brighten skin thanks to geothermal mineral mud from New Zealand’s volcanic plateau 

Common Uses

Dehydrated skin, Blemished Skin, Dull Skin 

Ingredients

Divine Face Oil Rosehip & Avocado Oil
Persea americana (Avocado Pear) Oil*, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Macadamia integrifolia (Macadamia) Nut Oil*, Rosa rubiginosa (Rosehip) Seed Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil. Fragrance of sweet orange, ylang ylang and jasmine: benzyl alcohol, benzyl benzoate†, benzyl salicylate†, citral, citronellol†, d-Limonene†, eugenol, farnesol†, geraniol†, isoeugenol†, linalool†. *Certified organic by BioGro
Culture Probiotic Night Recovery Water Cream 
Aqua (water), glycerine, cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, sodium acrylates copolymer & lecithin, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, Limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) oil, dehydroacetic acid, benzyl alcohol, glyceryl caprylate, bisabolol, sodium hyaluronate, xanthan gum & lecithin & sclerotium gum & pullulan, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, organic, Lactobacillus ferment, mannitol, maltodextrin, sodium citrate, Cyathea medullaris (mamaku) black fern extract, Phormium tenax (harakeke) flax extract, Hibiscus sabdariffa (hibiscus) flower extract, mica, titanium dioxide, iron oxide, manganese violet, Fragrance of Deep Fresh Rose: citral†, citronellol†, geraniol†, d-Limonene†, linalool†. 
Halo Skin-Brightening Facial Mud Mask 
Aqua (Water), Kaolin, Rotorua Mud, Glycerine, Propanediol (natural), Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Esters, Zinc Oxide, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Butylene Glycol, Arbutin, Citric Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Acetyl Tyrosine, Saxifraga sarmentosa (Strawberry begonia) Extract, Paeonia suffructicosa (Peony) Root Extract, Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate, Scutellaria baicalensis, (Skullcap) Root Extract, Glutathione, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Pongamia glabra (Indian Beech) Seed Oil, Asteriscus graveolens (Oxeye) Flower Extract, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea gratissima (Avocado Pear) Oil, Coco-Glucoside, Vitis vinifera (grape) Seed Extract, (Vinanza® Grape), Actinidia deliciosa (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, (Vinanza® Kiwi). Fragrance of Vanilla, Raspberry, Wild Berry & Musk: Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, d-Limonene, Farnesol, Geraniol, Linalool.

Directions

Apply a few drops of Divine organic face oil nightly to cleansed skin, using gentle upward strokes.  
 
Follow with generous application of Culture probiotic cream, premium vegan skincare that calms, clears, and hydrates. 
 
Once or twice a week, apply thick layers of Halo to decongest the skin and deliver brightening extracts. Leave on for 10-15 minutes before rinsing.
